aboutMe.description: I am a Front-End Developer based in Leipzig, Germany. After a decade in logistics, I transitioned to education, earning a Master's in Medical Physics. My journey into programming began during my master's studies, where I gained foundational knowledge in Python for data analysis. Having completed my front-end development training, I am now expanding my expertise into back-end development to become a full-stack developer. I am passionate about coding and aim to pursue a professional career as a skilled programmer.
aboutMe.contactMe: If you think I'd be good match for your Peojects, contac me!

portfolio.headerDescription: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

references.name: Join
references.description: Task manager inspired by the kanban system. Create and organize tasks with drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

references.name: Sharkie
references.description: An underwater adventure game using an object-oriented approach. Guide Sharkie, collect poison, and defeat the giant shark.

references.name: PokéCubes
references.description: A web app using PokeAPI to display first-gen Pokémon on interactive, rotatable cubes. Click on a Pokémon for more info.
